* Iron Raptor growled as the base shook, looking towards the far wall.
Who was attacking now?!
<Never ends....>
Most of the Maximals were still up in the shuttles and from what scanners 
read, the battle was over. They'de won. But now it was up to her to deal 
with this.
Or at least do as much as she could.
Iron Raptor thought of opening a commm to the Maximals coming home but 
they'de already saved the day. It was her turn now.
She looked at Histeria.*

" Make sure the shuttles get in safely and please put the shield up. Might 
save us some repair."

* She leaned down and set the little kitten on the floor, looking down at 
him.*

" You can help her to, little guy."

* And with that she turned away from the controle center and walked out of 
the room, her helm covering her face so that, once again, the BlackKnight 
was back.
Iron Raptor walked quickly enough so that it was only a few moments before 
she exited the CF, sword in hand and her shield ready to extend and obsorb 
charge energy.
Cape flapping in the wind, she looked at the three enemies that stood out on 
the battlefirled. There were the men who were causing the trouble?
She looked at each before sliding her sword back into it's hold, looking 
them over.
These 3 could easily be defeated, but they should at least know what they 
were up against.*

" Stop firing! We have no fight with you! Get lost!"

* She just stood there, an obviously east target.
Iron wasn't going to fight until she was forced to. And the base wouldn't 
fire, since all she'de said was to activate what was left of the shields.
So these men were left up to her and Kluster right now( it think he's on the 
field anyway, if not then just omit that past. :) )*
